SP.longDescription: State/Provincial tax with no additional information provided by Trading Partner

SQ.longDescription: Combination of State/Provincial Sales and Quebec Sales [see ST and QST for definitions]

ST.longDescription: State/Provincial tax paid for the sale of certain goods and services

SU.longDescription: Combination of Sales and Use Tax [see SATA and BB for definitions]

SUIP.longDescription: Text description used to provide context for usage

TX.longDescription: Total of all taxes when no further clarification is required

UNDF.longDescription: No additional information provided by Trading Partner

VA.longDescription: Consumption tax where the ultimate tax burden is paid by the end consumer with the benefit of additional accounting mechanisms due to the tax being paid at each transaction stage

Z.longDescription: A rate that is taxable for VAT, but the VAT rate is zero per cent. You can generally reclaim VAT on purchases that are sold as zero-rated goods or services. Zero rates are different than an exemption from VAT

TaxPercentQual.description: Code indicating on what basis a tax percent is calculated

7.description: Base Price Amount Less Previous Discount

TaxPercent.description: The percentage that is applied to determine the tax amount. Percentages should be represented as real numbers[0% through 100% should be normalized to 0.0 through 100.00]

JurisdictionQual.description: Code identifying the source of the data used in the Tax JurisdictionCode

JurisdictionCode.description: Code represents the City, State, or Providence[tax authority] associated with the Tax group

TaxExemptCode.description: Code indicating whether the header or item level data is exempt[or not exempt] for the tax and taxing authority indicated in JurisdictionCode

0.longDescription: Goods exempted from taxes because they are designated for export

RelationshipCode.description: Code identifying whether the tax amount is included in the total transaction amount

PercentDollarBasis.description: Monetary amount that is used when calculating a tax, allowance, or charge amount.

TaxHandlingCode.description: Code indicating method of handling for a tax

05.description: Charge to be paid by vendor

06.description: Charge to be paid by customer[Buying Organization]

TaxID.description: Number assigned to a purchaser[buyer, orderer] by a tax jurisdiction[state, country, etc]

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

MonetaryAmountCode.description: Code used to qualify or further define an amount value

MonetaryAmount.description: Amount total of various kinds in the transaction as defined by MonetaryAmountCode.

items.description: Indicates that the related item[s] are following the specified government or industry rules regarding material, manufacturing process and or end product

RegulatoryComplianceQual.description: Code indicating the act or legislation

ADA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act

ASTC.longDescription: Indicates the item can be labeled conductive per American Society for Testing and Materials [ASTM]

ASTD.longDescription: Indicates the item can be labeled static dissipative per American Society for Testing and Materials [ASTM]

ASTE.longDescription: Indicates the item can be labeled electrical hazard resistant per American Society for Testing and Materials [ASTM]

ASTM.longDescription: Indicates the item can be labeled metatarsal per American Society for Testing and Materials [ASTM]

ASTP.longDescription: Indicates the item can be labeled puncture resistant per American Society for Testing and Materials [ASTM]

CAA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Clean Air Act

CAEC.longDescription: Yes indicates if the item meets all necessary electrical certifications for Canada.

CAFA0.longDescription: Yes indicates non-compliance with California Air Resources Board [CARB] - Formaldehyde Act [Part 4]

CAFA1.longDescription: Yes indicates phase 1 compliance with California Air Resources Board [CARB] - Formaldehyde Act [Part 4]

CAFA2.longDescription: Yes indicates phase 2 compliance with California Air Resources Board [CARB] - Formaldehyde Act [Part 4]

CAFA3.description: CARB Formaldehyde Act No Added Formaldehyde
CAFA3.longDescription: Yes indicates that there was no added formaldehyde per California Air Resources Board [CARB] - Formaldehyde Act [Part 4]

CAFA4.description: CARB Formaldehyde Act Ultra Low Emission Formaldehyde Use [ULEF]
CAFA4.longDescription: Yes indicates that Ultra Low Emission Formaldehyde [ULEF] was used per with California Air Resources Board [CARB] - Formaldehyde Act [Part 4]

CANC.longDescription: Yes indicates if the item is a comsemtic item registered with Health Canada.

CE.longDescription: Yes indicates product is certified by the European Union

CERC.description: Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act
CERC.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act

CPSC.longDescription: Yes indicates product meets the safety standards of the Consumer Product Safety Commission

CPSFA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with US Consumer Product Safety Commission's Flammable Fabrics Act

CPSIA.description: Compliant with Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act
CPSIA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with US Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act

CSA.longDescription: Yes indicates product is certified by the Canadian Standards Association

CWA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Clean Water Act

DOLFL.description: Compliant with Fair Labor Standards Act
DOLFL.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with US Department Of Labor's Fair Labor Standards Act

DSCSA.longDescription: Yes indicates that this is the Transaction Statement as defined by the Drug Quality and Security Act

EPAES.longDescription: Yes indicates item is compliant with US Environmental Protection Agency's Energy Star program

EPAR.longDescription: Yes indicates that the product is registered with the EPA

EUEHS.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with European Union's Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive 2011/65/EU

FDA.longDescription: Indicates if the item complies with regulations described by the FDA

FHA.longDescription: Yes indicates that the item is approved for use by the Federal Housing Administration

FQA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the federal Fastener Quality Act

FTCFP.description: Compliant with Fur Products Labeling Act
FTCFP.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with US Federal Trade Commission's Fur Products Labeling Act

FTCTF.description: Compliant with Textile Fiber Product Identification Act and Regulations
FTCTF.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with US Federal Trade Commission's Textile Fiber Product Identification Act

FTCWA.description: Compliant with Wool Products Labeling Act
FTCWA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with US Federal Trade Commission's Wool Products Labeling Act

FTR.longDescription: Yes indicates the product is certified fair trade by a regulatory organization

GCC.longDescription: Indicates that the item is issued a General Certificate of Conformity by the manufacturer or imported in compliance with the Consumer Product Safety Commision [CPSC]

GNGA.longDescription: Agnecy responsible for inspecting and controlling a particular product type

HCAN.longDescription: Yes indicates if the item complies with Health Canada regulations. For more information, visit https://www.canada.ca/en/health-canada.html

HECC.longDescription: Yes indicates product is certified by the Hockey Equipment Council

INCI.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the International Nomenclature of Cosmetic Ingredients.

KPCS.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Kimberly Process Certification Scheme

MSDSR.longDescription: Yes indicates that a Material Safety Data Sheet is required for this item

NAFTA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with North American Free Trade Agreement and associated Compliance Number

NOCSAE.description: National Operating Committee on Standards for Athletic Equipment
NOCSAE.longDescription: Yes indicates product meets the standards of the National Operating Committee for Athletic Equipment

NSFI.longDescription: Indicates if the item complies with regulations described by NSF

OGC.longDescription: Yes indicates the product is certified organic by a regulatory organization

PACA.longDescription: Used to indicate whether the Perishable Agricultural Commodities Act (PACA) applies

RCRA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Resource Conservation and Recover Act

SDWA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Safe Drinking Water Act

STAEV.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with required State Environment Requirements

TITX.description: Residential Lead-Based Paint Hazard Reduction Act of 1992
TITX.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Residential Lead-Based Paint Hazard Reduction Act of 1992

TSCA.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with the Toxic Substances Control Act

USDA.longDescription: Indicates if the item has been inspected by and/or complies with USDA regulations

UWLB.longDescription: Indicates if the item has obtained certification from Underwriters Laboratories [UL]

VOORC.longDescription: Yes indicates compliance with required volatile organic compound regulations

WTRS.longDescription: Yes indicates the item has a WaterSense certification issued by the EPA

YesOrNoResponse.description: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

RegulatoryComplianceID.description: The ID relating to the RegulatoryComplianceQual, if applicable

RegulatoryAgency.description: Used to indicate the organization responsible for validating or enforcing the RegulatoryComplianceQual when not otherwise specified by the RegulatoryComplianceQual

Description.description: Free-form textual description to clarify the related data elements and their content
examples: New products only. Do not reuse packaging

TotalLineItemNumber.description: Sum of the total number of line items in this document

TotalNumberofPurchaseOrders.description: Number of orders enclosed in the document
